sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import {useMediaQuery} from 'react-responsive' import '../App.css'; function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('ToUpper LLC Gmail', 'template_whkpa5n', e.target, 'user_6XIEx1sRn9u9oj0HyYOxu') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); e.target.reset() } {/* Contact page */} function Contact() { return (
